review_text: i bought this car in July 2020 i m satisfied with it it's better than any hatchback of pakistan it's spare parts are realy cheap in price it's fuel average is marvellous it's like buying weganr with 660cc alto engine bigger boot space then any hatchback best road clearance  comfortable seats Power steering retractable mirrors Power windows abs breaks value to money.
